name: But they didn't listen...
description:
PLEASE NOTE:  Some things like the movement speed or clicking the links in the about page might not work correctly in the  WebGL-Version. If you are having issues, or want to have the full experience, consider downloading the game. If your monitor isn't 16:9, going fullscreen might cut off some parts of the game.

Once Upon a terrible time, everything was still good. It was terrible, because  we already new what was going to happen. But they didn't listen...

In "But they didn't listen" you take the role of a daring explorer who tries to survive on an apocalyptic earth, that is  deadly because of climate change's consequences.  The game was made for "Dani's Basement Game Jam 2" by allesman and ChrisCrazy.   Of course the game  isn’t perfect, but this was our first Game Jam and   we’re happy with how it turned out! Try to beat our highscore of 178!
